see Iran

Zazaki is a Northwestern Iranian language spoken in eastern Turkey by the Zazas 𒅗.

Zazaki has very strong connections to known forms:

𔐱 don ⇔ 𒌉 dumu doman diq 𔐱𔕬𔗬𔑰𔖱 daughter dú/tú-wa-ta-r дитя́ ditjá дете́ deté tut "child"

𒆏 KAB, GAB2, GUB3 𓎼 𓄿 𓃀 𓂢 (left) arm çep@Zazaki

𓈗 derya @ Zazaki •triamat 3𒆳 Tiamat 𒋾𒊩𒆳 ti-amtu 𒌓𒁴 tam-tim terramar™ 𓇾𓈗 ? meratom ?

𒆪𒄯𒊒 ku-mur-ru amoren "count" @ Zazaki <> 𒈪𒉡 miʳnu

𓋴 𓐍 𓀒 | throw | çekerden @ Zazaki

𓋴𓃀𓏘 šepíqa > saqe "leg"

𓂾 ⲣⲁⲧ reez "knee" <> race

𒅆 ŠI çım "eye"

𓃀 𓂓 𓁸 | lock of hair | bu.khair bu.hair beard por "hair"@Zazaki

𓈎 𓈖 𓄃 | fat | ᶜron ᶜruwen @ Zazaki

𒌑 vaᵒˢ vaş √wachs Gewächs "grass"

𒋢𒈠𒋢 su-ma-su "sea-fish" mase ≈ 𒈲 MUŠ ?" sea-esche

𒌨 ḪUL ⇔ 𓃡 Töle ⇔ tail / Tier / del @ Zazaki

dull (as a knife) kor <> kirkiran @ Kush <> кунд kund ?
